text: One can not reflect in streaming water. Only those who know internal peace can give it to others.
author: Lao Tzu

text: There are many things that are essential to arriving at true peace of mind, and one of the most important is faith, which cannot be acquired without prayer.
author: John Wooden

text: Parents are not interested in justice, they're interested in peace and quiet.
author: Bill Cosby

text: We call that person who has lost his father, an orphan and a widower that man who has lost his wife. But that man who has known the immense unhappiness of losing a friend, by what name do we call him? Here every language is silent and holds its peace in impotence.
author: Joseph Roux

text: Never be in a hurry do everything quietly and in a calm spirit. Do not lose your inner peace for anything whatsoever, even if your whole world seems upset.
author: Saint Francis de Sales
